name: Dapple Lite - Color Mixing, Puzzle Game Fun!
name_original: Dapple Lite - Color Mixing, Puzzle Game Fun!
description:
Grab your brush, don your painter's smock, put on your thinking cap, and get ready to become a master painter! Play the game that The Portable Gamer called "the Hexic of our times"!

REVIEWS FOR FULL VERSION:
------------------------------------------
One of the "Best iPhone Games of 2009" -- Kotaku.com

4.25/5 Stars
"It’s a fun new take on the color-matching formula that requires some new strategies and makes for loads of fun." - 148Apps.com

"Dapple is a great blueprint in iPhone game design - flawlessly executed with many small flourishes. It's definitely worth a look." - wePlayiPhone.com

"the integration of color mixing basics and beautiful presentation make Dapple a definite must have." - theAppera.com
------------------------------------------

Dapple Lite is a free version of Dapple that allows you to play the first 4 levels of the full game.
Visit our website for Dapple gameplay and tutorial videos: www.dapplegame.com

DESCRIPTION OF FULL VERSION:
------------------------------------------

■ MATCHING GAME WITH A CHALLENGE
Dapple is a color matching game for the hardcore puzzle game player. Do you like Match-3 games, but want something with a little more challenge? Try Dapple!

■ PAINT-MIXING FUN!
In Dapple, mix paint colors to match 4 or more of the same color together. You'll need to learn the ways in which colors mix to become an expert player!

■ 3 EXCITING GAME MODES ➥

CLASSIC MODE
Relax and enjoy the game. No time limits, no pressure. Get the highest score possible before you run out of moves.

TIMED MODE
Race against the clock. How many points can you rack up before the clock runs down?

2 PLAYER MODE
Compete against another player on the same device, or challenge a computer opponent.

■ COLORBLIND MODE
Dapple uses completely different art for Colorblind Mode providing a compelling experience for colorblind players. (See screenshot #4)

■ MUSIC CHOICES
Enjoy the custom soundtrack written for the game, or listen your own iPod music while you play.

■ AUTO-SAVE
Dapple saves your game any time you quit or answer a phone call.
